definition: Disney (company name, surname)/Walt Disney (1901-1966), American animator and film producer
member of the senior ministerial class (old)/scholar (old)/bachelor/honorific/soldier/noncommissioned officer/specialist worker
Buddhist nun/(often used in phonetic spellings)

sentences.english: By the hotel to the Hong Kong Disneyland is only a few minutes walk.
sentences.chinese: 由酒店到香港迪士尼樂園只是數分鐘之步程。

sentences.english: You can actually go parasailing at Walt Disney World. It's easy to do.
sentences.chinese: 事實上你還可以在迪士尼做帆傘運動，這很容易的。

sentences.english: The most profound contrast between the Grimms' Snow White and Disney's is the ending.
sentences.chinese: 格林版與迪士尼版之間顯著的差異在於其結局。

sentences.english: Disney knows how to do movies.
sentences.chinese: 迪士尼知道如果做電影。

sentences.english: Another predicted, 'Shanghai Disneyland is likely to become a 'chicken rib' [an expression for something insignificant].
sentences.chinese: 另外一位網民預測，上海迪士尼樂園很可能成爲雞肋。

sentences.english: Disney had made a better transition to movies with sound.
sentences.chinese: 迪士尼做出了一個更好的轉向有聲電影的過渡。

sentences.english: Disney declined to say how many students it has.
sentences.chinese: 迪士尼拒絕透露它有多少學生。

sentences.english: Will Disney open a Performance Store like Apple Inc?
sentences.chinese: 迪士尼開像蘋果一樣的體驗店？

sentences.english: Will you visit Disneyland in the future?
sentences.chinese: 你會否在將來再訪迪士尼樂園？

sentences.english: We laughed like children, and we watched a lot of Walt Disney.
sentences.chinese: 我們就像孩子一樣大笑，還看了不少迪士尼動畫片。

sentences.english: he built the Disney Concert Hall and he's like really famous and
sentences.chinese: 他建造了迪士尼音樂廳，他很有名。

sentences.english: We built Disney Land and the Neuschwanstein Castle Replica in the Name of MONEY…The Chinese copy our concept again and come out ahead.
sentences.chinese: 我們以金錢的名義建了迪士尼樂園和天鵝堡的複製品。

sentences.english: A day at Disney can remedy all that.
sentences.chinese: 在迪士尼待上一天可以解決一切。

sentences.english: This young star made his debut in a Disney movie.
sentences.chinese: 這位年輕的明星是在迪士尼的電影中初試啼聲的。

sentences.english: The Disney sculptures were created over a two-week period.
sentences.chinese: 迪士尼雕塑的完成花了超過兩週的時間。

sentences.english: Home "Auto" Lighting DRL daytime running lights.
sentences.chinese: 首頁汽車照明迪士尼線的日間行車燈。

definition: Disney (company name, surname)/also written 迪士尼[Di2 shi4 ni2]
Time Warner Inc., US media company
to purchase (from various places)/to acquire (a company)
theater chain (abbr. for 電影院線|电影院线)
